name: Les Visions du chevalier Tondal
description: Les Visions du chevalier Tondal; Simon Marmion (Flemish, active 1450 - 1489), and David Aubert (Flemish, active 1453 - 1479); Ghent, Belgium; 1475; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment tipped into a binding of wood boards covered with brown calf; Leaf: 36.3 × 26.2 cm (14 5/16 × 10 5/16 in.); Ms. 30; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Les Visions du chevalier Tondal
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment tipped into a binding of wood boards covered with brown calf
